title: Purpose of a Slide Title
text: A slide title serves as a brief introduction to the content that follows.

title: Clarity and Conciseness
text: The title should be clear and concise, summarizing the main point of the slide.

title: Avoiding Overload
text: A slide title should not be overloaded with information or details.

title: Visual Appeal vs. Function
text: While visual appeal is important, the primary function of a title is to inform, not just to decorate.

title: Space Utilization
text: The title should not be used merely to fill space on the slide.

title: Complementing Explanations
text: A title complements detailed explanations but does not replace them.
